thread.title: BREAKING: Justice Department APPEALS judge’s block on Donald Trump’s ‘Muslim ban’
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Justice Department APPEALS judge’s block on Donald Trump’s ‘Muslim ban’

title: BREAKING: Justice Department APPEALS judge’s block on Donald Trump’s ‘Muslim ban’
text:
“No one is above the law — not even the President. 
“It’s our president's duty to honour this ruling and I'll make sure he does.” EPA The Justice Department has launched a formal appeal against the block 
Mr Trump has reacted furiously to the ruling and took to Twitter to vent his fury. 
He has tweeted: “When a country is no longer able to say who can, and who cannot, come in and out, especially for reasons of safety and security – big trouble! 
"The opinion of this so-called judge, which essentially takes law-enforcement away from our country, is ridiculous and will be overturned! GETTY Trump lambasted the ruling by Judge James Robart 
“Because the ban was lifted by a judge, many very bad and dangerous people may be pouring into our country. A terrible decision.” 
More to follow.
